Source Water Protection
Source Water Protection
page.normal_text:
Leah G Walker, P.E. Senior Sanitary Engineer California Department of Health Services Drinking Water Technical Programs Branch
Leah G Walker, P.E.
Senior Sanitary Engineer

page.title:
What Is Source Water Protection?
What Is Source Water Protection?
page.normal_text:
Taking proactive measures to prevent the pollution of lakes, rivers, streams and ground water that serve as sources of drinking water.
Taking proactive measures to prevent the T a k i n g
p r o a c t i v e m e a s u r e s
t o
p r e v e n t
t h e
pollution of lakes, rivers, streams and
ground water that serve as sources of
drinking water.

Wellhead Protection is another frequently used term that applies to Source Water Protection for ground water sources.
Wellhead Protection is another frequently
used term that applies to Source Water
Protection for ground water sources.

page.title:
Why do Source Water Protection?
Why do Source Water Protection?
page.normal_text:
• Because the most cost effective method to ensure the safety of the drinking water supply is to protect the source from contamination.
• Because the most cost effective method to ensure the • B e c a u s e

source from contamination.

page.enlisting:
• Source water protection is best done at the
